Description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products, including search engines, online advertising, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence. It is a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc. and is one of the Big Five American tech companies.

The Coca-Cola Company is an American multinational corporation specializing in beverages, particularly the world-famous soft drink Coca-Cola. Founded in 1892, it is one of the largest beverage companies globally, offering over 500 brands in more than 200 countries.

Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells computer software, consumer electronics, personal computers, and related services. Known for its Windows operating system and Office suite, Microsoft is one of the Big Five tech companies.

Nike, Inc. is an American multinational corporation that designs, manufactures, markets, and sells footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessories. Known for its iconic "Swoosh" logo and innovative athletic products, Nike is one of the world's leading sportswear brands
